EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing MyNCR Online Invoice Payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now you have a new feature that makes managing your business even simpler: MyNCR Online Invoice Payments. It enables you to pay your invoices online at any time using your bank account.
How to Use MyNCR Online Invoice Payments
Just log in <[[http://myncr.ncr.com/]]> to MyNCR like you usually do and visit the “Invoices” page.
Then you can choose one of two paths to pay your invoices:
- Pay a single invoice by visiting the Invoice Detail page and clicking the “Pay Now” button. - Pay multiple invoices at once by selecting their checkboxes in the “Invoice Table” view and clicking the “Pay Now” button.
You can also get a step-by-step walkthrough in the attached training guide <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/How to Pay Invoices in MyNCR.pdf]]>. To find it on the site, click the question mark button on MyNCR to visit the Help Center.
Thank you, NCR Corporation If you have any questions or issues, please contact: MyNCR.Administrator@ncr.com, 1-888-303-2434 or outside the U.S. at 1-937-449-4281
